text: Moutiers-au-Perche is a commune in the Orne département, lower Normandy. This is a village in the province of Perche. There are 525 people. The surface is . The altitude is . It was a monastery created by Saint Laurent in the sixth century. There is a Château de Guilbault built at the time of the Directoire. There is a park with an old bridge also. There is a Roman style church of Notre-Dame-Du-Mont-Harou with a mural painting and a wooden statue. Category:Communes in Orne
title: Moutiers-au-Perche
